content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE RawDataOrderCategories (
	[orderId] varchar(8000),
	[brandName] varchar(8000),
	[brandId] varchar(8000),
	[categoriesid] varchar(8000),
	[categoriesname] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/vtex/VtextOrderCategories.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM RawDataOrderCategories
GO
